text: Dagur is an Icelandic male given name. == People == People with the name include: * Dagur Arngrímsson (born 1987), Icelandic chess International Master * Dagur Bergþóruson Eggertsson (born 1972), Icelandic politician * Dagur Kár Jónsson (born 1995), Icelandic basketball player * Dagur Kári (born 1973), Icelandic film director * Dagur Sigurðsson (born 1973), retired Icelandic handball player * Steinar Dagur Adolfsson (born 1970), retired Icelandic football defender === Fictional characters === * Dagur the Deranged, an antagonist in the American animated television series DreamWorks Dragons == See also == * Dagur (disambiguation) * Dagger (disambiguation) * Dagr, the personified day in Norse mythology Category:Icelandic masculine given names
title: Dagur (name)
